Sylvanas.name: Withering Fire
Sylvanas.description: Shoot the closest enemy for 48 (+4% per level) damage, preferring Heroes.  Stores 5 charges.  Gain 1 charge on nearby enemy Minion or Mercenary deaths, and 3 charges on nearby enemy Hero deaths.

Sylvanas.name: Shadow Dagger
Sylvanas.description: Deals 37 (+4% per level) damage and an additional 148 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds to target unit. The effect spreads to nearby targets.

Sylvanas.name: Haunting Wave
Sylvanas.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

Sylvanas.name: Wailing Arrow
Sylvanas.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.

Sylvanas.name: Mind Control
Sylvanas.description: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

Sylvanas.name: Black Arrows
Sylvanas.description: Basic Attacks and Abilities stun Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures for 1 second.

1.name: Dreadful Wake
1.description: Haunting Wave now disables Minions and Mercenaries for 7 seconds and restores 5 Mana per minion hit.

1.name: Mercenary Queen
1.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near you deal 60% more damage.

1.name: Overflowing Quiver
1.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, a free, untalented Withering Fire is shot. This cannot hit Heroes.

4.name: Lost Soul
4.description: Reduce Shadow Dagger's cooldown by 1.25 seconds each time it spreads to a Hero.

4.name: Withering Barrage
4.description: Increase Withering Fire charges by 1. Charges can be fired 33% faster.

7.name: Barbed Shot
7.description: Withering Fire deals 200% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

7.name: Possession
7.description: Force an enemy Minion to fight for you. Stores up to 3 charges.

7.name: Unstable Poison
7.description: Minions that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 116 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Does not damage Heroes or Structures.

10.name: Mind Control
10.description: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Wailing Arrow
10.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.

13.name: Life Drain
13.description: Shadow Dagger heals you for 37 (+4% per level) each time it spreads to an enemy.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Will of the Forsaken
13.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.name: Windrunner
13.description: Teleporting with Haunting Wave fully recharges your Withering Fire. Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting.

16.name: Cold Embrace
16.description: Shadow Dagger lowers the Armor of the initial enemy by 25 for 2 seconds, causing them to take 25% more damage.

16.name: Evasive Fire
16.description: When you hit an enemy with Withering Fire, gain 10% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

16.name: Overwhelming Affliction
16.description: Black Arrows now also applies to Heroes, slowing their Movement Speed by 6% for the duration. Stacks up to 5 times.

16.name: Remorseless
16.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

20.name: Dark Lady's Call
20.description: Mind Controlled enemies gain 100% Movement Speed for the duration.

20.name: Deafening Blast
20.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
